init.title: OpenRouteService Options
init.description: Configure caching behavior, units, and language preferences.

data_description.geocoding_cache_days: How long to cache geocoded addresses (0 to disable caching)
data_description.route_cache_days: How long to cache calculated routes (0 to disable caching)
data_description.units: Units for distance measurements (m=meters, km=kilometers, mi=miles)
data_description.language: Language for turn-by-turn instructions (select 'custom' to enter a specific code)

custom_language.title: Custom Language Code
custom_language.description: Enter a custom language code (e.g., 'sv' for Swedish, 'pl' for Polish)

plan_route.name: Plan route
plan_route.description: Plan a route between two addresses.

cache_type.name: Cache type
cache_type.description: Which cache to clear (geocoding, routes, or all).
